title: v1.0.0
items: Added a new setting called 'useLoadLastPreset'. If you're a user who is experiencing the backpack interaction bug, uncheck this setting as a temporary workaround.

title: v1.0.0
items: Now tracks Necromancy XP when creating necroplasm

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed an issue that was causing the bot to load preset 1 when a preset wasn't configured to be used
Fixed an issue that was preventing the creation of Ring of Slaying (8)

title: v1.0.0
items: Added option to craft Regular, Greater, and Powerful Ghostly Ink

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed cutting gems directly from inventory
